content: Currently pursuing my masters in Computer Science from The University of Texas at Arlington having specialization in Artificial Intelligence and Database.

summary: learning model that predicts which Tweets are about real disasters and which one’s aren’t by accessing a dataset of 10,000 tweets that were hand classified.
title: Predicting Real vs Fake Tweets

summary: Implemented a simple data pipeline to count the number of visitors on a website each day

summary: Implemented a project to virtually try footwear through a mobile application. Created AR models for shoes using Vuforia and Unity3d. Used YOLO algorithm to train image dataset
title: Virtual Shoe Trial

summary: Implemented a project based on the probability distribution and their distribution functions .Simulated and analyzed various discrete and continuous probability distributions using Python3.
title: Simulation of Random Variables

summary: Implemented an AI program using Python3 to play Connect4 interactively based on a MinMax strategy. Evaluated board states to make an optimal decision for the next move
title: Connect4 board game
